amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Department of Energy's Office of Science account by $820,488,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 43 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the Science account under the Department of Energy by $820,488,000 and increase the Spending Reduction account by the same amount.
